title: Crashing the Boards
description: Currently released as part of the "Seduced by the Game" anthology and the "Playing for Passion" sports romance bundle. Will be released as a standalone on November 1.Professional party crasher, Izzy Maxwell, needs the cooperation of reluctant party guest Cooper Black, the team captain of Seattle’s new hockey team, but Cooper can’t get past his anger over the team’s relocation to Seattle. Can Izzy melt Cooper’s frozen heart or will this party crash along with her fledgling business?
author: Jami Davenport
